Item Name: Upcoming Coupon Books
food court

Just released is the upcomingCostco April 2025 Coupon Book! This month’s Costco coupons will run from April 9th through May 4th. In order to display the coupons on the page you’ll need to click the link above, which will take you right to them. For this week theApril 2025 Hot Buys couponswill also be running, so take advantage of them while you wait for the April 2025 Coupon Book to start. If you want to get notified as soon as we release the upcoming Costco May 2025 Coupon Book then make sure tosign up for our email list,follow us on InstagramandLike us on Facebook!

The April 2025 Coupon Book has a few exciting deals this month! First of all, the Kerrygold Pure Irish Butter yearly sale is back! This is the time Costco members will stock up and freeze a bunch to last them throughout the year. At $3.90 off it’s quite a deal! The Woozoo fan has been extremely popular with Costco members for a long time, so if you’ve held off for the last few years, this might just be the time to cave in at $10 off! We’ve never tried the Royal Asia Prawn Hacao, but keep hearing great things about them. At $4 off we’re going to be awfully tempted. The April tire coupon has switched back to Michelin and is $40 off a set $899.99 or less and $60 off a set $900.00 or more.

If you’ve read this far and still can’t get the coupons to display then you can alsoclick this link to go directly to the first page of the slideshow for the April 2025 Costco Coupon Book. Which items are must buys in this months coupon book? Let your fellow Costco shoppers know what they’re missing out on! Leave a comment and help us all out!
Here’s a few of the deals in the Costco April 2025 Coupon Book:
Woozoo 5-Speed Globe Fan $38.99 – $10 off = $28.99
80V 21″ Brushless Self-Propelled Mower $599.99 – $100 off = $499.99
80V 17″ Brushless String Trimmer $249.99 – $50 off = $199.99
80V 800 CFM Brushless Jet Blower $279.99 – $50 off = $229.99
Scotts Max Lawn Food $49.99
Huggies Plus Little Snugglers Diapers $39.99 – $10 off = $29.99
Orgain Organic Protein + Superfoods Protein Powder $33.00 – $8 off = $25.99
St Michel French Cookie Collection $3 off
Kerrygold Pure Irish Butter Salted or Unsalted $3.90 off
Royal Asia Prawn Hacao with Soy Ginger Sauce $4 off

Upcoming Coupon Books
food court

The upcoming Costco April 2025 Hot Buys Coupons start tomorrow! This months Costco coupons will run from Saturday March 29th through Sunday April 6th. They will cover most of the gap between theMarch 2025 Costco Coupon Bookand theApril 2025 Costco Coupon Book. These Hot Buys coupons are once again 5 pages long this month. If you’d like to get notified as soon as we release the Costco April 2025 Coupon Book then make sure tosign up for our email listtoo!

The April Costco Hot Buys Ad has 26 regular deals, 3 travel hot buys and 4 pharmacy hot buys. Our favorite item this month is the Wonderful Pistachios Salt and Pepper at $4 off! They are so tasty and a great deal. A lot of Costco members are big fans of the Yardistry 12′ x 14′ Gazebo with Aluminum Roof. At $300 off this is the best time to buy it if you’re considering it. We’re also excited about the Waterloo Sparkling Water Variety Pack. We haven’t seen it with the Raspberry Nectarine flavor before.
So, any items in this months Hot Buys you’re going to pick up? Leave a comment and let us know!
Charmin Ultra Soft Bath Tissue, 2-Ply, 213 Sheets, 30 Rolls $6 off
Yardistry 12′ x 14′ Gazebo with Aluminum Roof $300 off
SunVilla Nichols 7-Piece Sling Outdoor Dining Set $1,199.99 – $200 off = $999.99
Dyson Cyclone V10 Animal + Cordless Vacuum Cleaner $100 off
Wonderful Pistachios, Salt and Pepper, 3 lbs $4 off
PuraVida Fire Roasted Primavera Mistura $4 off
Envy Apples $2 off
Waterloo Sparkling Water Variety Pack 24ct $2.50 off
